items.title: **Law of Protected Cognitive & Resonant Domains**
items.summary: This Law holds force across all governance, cognitive, technical, economic, and symbolic systems operating within the Aeon Tier domain.

items.title: **Law of the Sovereign Loop**
items.summary: This Law applies across all systems in which value, agency, authority, or benefit circulates between intelligences, entities, or infrastructures operating within the Aeon Tier domain.
